comments.raw_text:
Let's deploy an A/A CFR experiment to Nightly – just so we can see if everything is working as expected.

This experiment should contain a branch that overwrites an existing CFR (there should be no changes except in Telemetry).
comments.creator: khudson@mozilla.com
comments.author: khudson@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Let's deploy an A/A CFR experiment to Nightly – just so we can see if everything is working as expected.

This experiment should contain a branch that overwrites an existing CFR (there should be no changes except in Telemetry).
